text:
@rexxurection @realDonaldTrump Reminder:

#COVID19, Sunday morning, 5/10/2020:

Confirmed cases - 1,311,099
Deaths - 78,862
Universal testing - ~2%

Who is willing to sacrifice his or her mom to the campaign needs of the most #Corrupt & #Incompetent #POTUS in our history?

#NovemberIsComing in 178 days.
